job.title: Chief Technical Architect
brief: Initially I was the sole developer for this Start-Up mobile solutions provider. As the company progressed & grew I undertook responsibility for a team of developers. I managed & contributed to the development of bespoke OO PHP applications for delivery of mobile services & the internal management through reports & statistical analysis. I managed the migration of our data services from MySQL to Oracle RDBMS. As a customer-facing & results-oriented business, Agile methodology & principles was our natural development environment.
